text: @ShekharGupta @ChandnaHimani No, it doesn't. In the US, hydroxychloroquine usage has been linked to greater mortality rates among CoVid-19 patients, so shut up and GTFO. Stick with doing propaganda for Modi bhakts, no need to double-dip into twerking for Trumpers.
